text:
@SpeakerPelosi Historically speaking you called The Presidents travel ban "racist", refused to follow CDC recommendations to restock the N95 masks used during the H1N1 virus outbreak and tore up the SOTU speech in which The President stated the severity of the COVID-19 outbreak.
Shut up, fool.
